casebody.data:
KATE HAVLIN MARTIN, joined by her husband, W. WALTER MARTIN, v. FAUD H. HANNA and MARGARET ALICE HANNA, his wife. 32 So. (2nd) 922

June Term, 1947

December 19, 1947 Division A Owen W. Pittman, for Plaintiffs. R. K. Bell, for defendants. PER CURIAM:

The certifiied question is not answered because it is not a question contemplated under Rule 38 of this Court.

THOMAS, C. J., TERRELL, CHAPMAN and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
